question: How should a woman makes up for the mandatory fasts she misses due to monthly periods?
answer:
QUESTION
I have a lot of these fasts to make up but don't have the strength to do so due to pregnancy and the period of lactation for another year or more. I was also pregnant last year. Can I give fidya or do I have to keep these fasts later?
ANSWER


Share:

A woman who is young and healthy must make Qadhaa (make up) for her missed
fasts. She cannot give Fidya (monetary compensation) for the missed fasts.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
